function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Staggering scale of healthcare waste","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, environmental pollution","Mitigation":"Improved waste management policies, waste minimization, and recycling programs","Technologies":"Waste separation and recycling technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, sanitation workers, general population","Owner":"Government, waste management agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in disposable medical hardware and plastic packaging","Impact":"Accumulation of non-biodegradable waste, heightened environmental impacts","Mitigation":"Promotion of biodegradable alternatives, waste reduction strategies","Technologies":"Biodegradable materials, waste reduction technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, sanitation workers, general population","Owner":"Manufacturers, government, waste management agencies"},{"Description":"Complications in HCI waste treatment and management","Impact":"Challenges in waste disposal, risk of contamination","Mitigation":"Physicochemical waste characterization, waste minimization, recycling programs","Technologies":"Waste characterization technologies, waste minimization technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, sanitation workers, waste management personnel","Owner":"Government, waste management agencies"}]}
